definition: Dodge Nitro (abbr. for 道奇翼龍|道奇翼龙)
wing/area surrounding the bullseye of a target/to assist/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/old variant of 翌
surname Yi/alternative name for 絳|绛[Jiang4] capital of the Jin State during the Spring and Autumn Period (770-475 BC)

sentences.english: They might have had fur, but didn't have feathers.
sentences.chinese: 无齿翼龙也许会有皮毛，但是不会有羽毛。

sentences.english: These conditions gave rise to the dinosaurs, pterosaurs, and early crocodilians.
sentences.chinese: 这些条件，引起了恐龙，翼龙，鳄鱼和早期。

sentences.english: Perhaps the least controversial assertion about the pterosaurs is that they were reptiles.
sentences.chinese: 可能，最少引起争论的意见就是翼龙是爬行动物。

sentences.english: He's also not convinced that the round structure found with the pterosaur is an egg.
sentences.chinese: 帕蒂恩也不能确信翼龙旁边那个圆形构造就是一枚卵。

sentences.english: Ochredrakes are a curious species with a wide array of mutations and interesting behaviors.
sentences.chinese: 赭黄翼龙是一个具广泛突变和有趣行为的特别龙种。

sentences.english: The pterosaurs resembled both birds and bats in their overall structure and proportions.
sentences.chinese: 翼龙和鸟类以及蝙蝠在总体结构及比例上很相似。

sentences.english: The bones of Pteranodons have been found in Kansas in the United States and in England.
sentences.chinese: 在美国的堪萨斯州和英国发现过无齿翼龙的化石。

definition: vulture/(bird species of China) griffon vulture (Gyps fulvus)
(bird species of China) golden eagle (Aquila chrysaetos)
monstrous bird/moa (genus Dinornithidae, extinct bird of New Zealand)
capercaillie (Lagopus, several species)/thunderbird (in native American mythology)
